website_summaries.verdict: Stores your nutmeg nuts until you're ready to use them, then grinds them down to your desired level of fineness.
pros: Integrated storage for up to four nutmegs
Flavor-lock cap.Handle folded out for easy operation
Handle can be folded back for space-saving storage
Grinds down to the last bit of nutmeg

customer_reviews.title: This thing has to be looked at as the Mercedes ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has to be looked at as the Mercedes or BMW of nutmeg graters. Its German engineering bears the same relationship to the more common French graters as those cars do to French cars. In other words, I find most other nutmeg graters, nearly all of French origin or using French critical parts, to be very frustrating whereas this one simply grates the nutmeg with no fuss. And they've even put a cap on the bottom so you don't get nutmeg gratings all over wherever you sit it after use (I used to sit my old grater in a recycled jar lid).
customer_reviews.author: B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best Grinder I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 nutmeg grinders. None of them has worked as well as this one. It grinds the nutmeg down to the last little bit. The previous two grinders only ground down about 2/3 of the nutmeg and left chunks of nutmeg in my food. I love the slim design and fold over handle as it doesn't take up as much space in the cabinet. I especially appreciate the cover that fits onto the bottom of the grinder that prevents a mess.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nutmeg grinders are difficult to find
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but it was hard to find a nutmeg grinder with consistently high reviews. We actually started by buying the round Peugeot 19501 with acrylic top because I've used and liked Peugeot pepper grinders in the past. But the Peugeot nutmeg grinder was cheaply made, the plastic flimsy, and I could tell it wouldn't last. After returning that one, we took our chance on the Gefu and are very happy with this one. The Gefu grinds as well as the Peugeot but is much better made and we think it will last.
customer_reviews.author: G. Noer

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy product the worst
customer_reviews.text: this nutmeg grinder is absolutely the worst. First, I tried a very long time but couldn't grate the nutmeg. i tried and tried and couldn't do it.That is a long story re: phone numbers. Web sites for company did not offer help. Then, while I was trying to get it to work, the little clear plastic top kept falling off. If I could have just gotten some advice. Overall, I rate this the worst encounter I've ever had with anything I've have purchased. EVER I spent a very long time writing a review and it's disappeared. Whatever happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Sally Whitton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great grater! Also have the Peugeot and this is much better. Easier to load the nutmeg and a finer grate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Best nutmeg grater I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've used 10-15 nutmeg graters over the years (think eggnog). This is without a doubt the best one I've ever used. It is very high quality, easy to use, and produces an amazing fine grated nutmeg. I am extremely happy with it and have purchased a couple as presents for family. About the only thing I can complain about is the bottom of the unit, which is used to cover the output blades, was initially difficult to remove and we were confused by it. But I'm nitpicking. I've seen the price for it fluctuate as it goes in and out of stock from various venders but it is worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best grinder I have used
customer_reviews.text: The job of a grinder should be to produce copious amounts of finely ground nutmeg with ease. This grinder has very sharp blades and it really does grind a lot of nutmeg very fast. Its construction appears to be more fragile than some others but mine is still fine after a year and half of almost daily use. Some other grinders are so sturdy that you could drive a truck over them BUT they do not grind worth a darn. If you want a grinder that grinds, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: LCF/Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love this grater.  Nice design. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Though it is a little expensive I am glad I bought this. I've used it for several years and just bought another for my sister. --Needed something easier for grating nutmeg than a simple plane as my fingers are weak/carpal tunnel. --This is smooth, nicely designed, very sharp grater that lets you use every bit of a nut
customer_reviews.author: WordGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. It does what it should, grinds whole nutmeg, has a cap on the bottom to keep everything neat, and stores several nutmegs in an air tight top. I’m not sure why some reviews say it’s cheaply made. It seems like a solid, functional grinder.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Cool design.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool device just a fascinating invention seems like it will last a lifetime also. Very cool idea how that has the spring loaded storage container and just everything about it is really cool
customer_reviews.author: SmokingChicken

customer_reviews.title: no waste! About three revolutions produce 1/4 teaspoon
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nutmeg grinder that I have found that will grind a nut down to nothing. When it is time to change a nut, I take the piece lodged in the teeth and replace it with a new nut and put the piece in the base, no waste! About three revolutions produce 1/4 teaspoon.
customer_reviews.author: JMath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grater
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and high quality nutmeg grater. Because of the spring load function, it can work with only a single nutmeg. If you are looking for a nutmeg grater, I would recommend that you get this one instead of trying to save a few dollars on less effective models.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fo grounding nutmeg!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to usen,always does a great job.i would like to be able to buy caps for both ends as I. Have losses ends to the first one and though it works perfectly I can no longer collect ground nutmeg in one end and I can no longer store whole nutmeg in the top end.!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn  Stronach

customer_reviews.title: The best nutmeg grinder I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is such a simple little gadget, that honestly doesn't get used a ton, but nevertheless is easy to load and grinds with very precise control! Hideaway grinding lever so takes up little space on the counter top or in the cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Cblow5

customer_reviews.title: Better than its competition
customer_reviews.text: I had another nutmeg grinder that cracked and was no longer usable, sure glad it did as this is far better than what I had. It easily shaves the nutmeg with far less effort. I like that it stores extra whole nutmeg, and looks good on the counter
customer_reviews.author: B. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Nutmeg Mill
customer_reviews.text: My mom gave me a William Bounds Nut Twister Mill that I used for 40 years. I really liked it. Alas,the top of it broke when the N-Twister fell to the floor. I intended to order another but they were back-ordered so I tried this one. I like it very much. It grates perfectly, has a compartment for catching the grated nutmeg (or not), stores the extras and doesn't take up a lot of cupboard space. I recommend this GEFU grater. I'll post another review in 40 years if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Grates like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to figure this thing out (opening, putting in the nutmeg, making sure the lid is off when grinding and the fact that it has storage space that is separate) but once you get used to it this thing is awesome. Does not grate really fine - but it does a really good job and makes it quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stuey G

customer_reviews.title: Only The Price Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Only the price brings down the rating. This item does work. Its the only nutmeg grinder I ever bought that does.
customer_reviews.author: quanarose

customer_reviews.title: Decided to splurge on this one and so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Amazeballs. I bought one of the squat ones first thinking I could save some pennies. Loading it took an act of nature and it stopped grinding after 1 week of minimal use. Decided to splurge on this one and so glad I did. So easy to load, grinds like a dream, plus it has storage and an end cap to keep the nutmeg "dust" from getting al over my pantry when not in use. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Artoo Deetoo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to
customer_reviews.text: We brew our coffee with fresh nutmeg. This device allows us to do just that without having to grate it. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: C273

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn't cost as much as it does, but it is worth it. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michelle Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased to replace an old one made of plastic. This is a far superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books and Music

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this grater upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I used a box nutmeg grater for years and got tired of skinned knuckles. This grater is a dream. Stores plenty of grated nutmeg and the grated output is all the same size. Very well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Mndee

customer_reviews.title: Fresh nutmeg at a touch
customer_reviews.text: Love having fresh nutmeg at the slightest turn of the handle. Cap at the bottom keeps it from scattering when sitting in my cupboard. Easy to use, stores Textra nutmegs in the base. Perfect for adding a touch of fresh nutmeg garnish to drinks or dishes. I love this grater!
customer_reviews.author: Sunsprite

customer_reviews.title: Works Great -- Makes Nutmeg a Treat!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a fancy nutmeg grinder, and while some other styles look a little sleeker, this one works wonderfully and truly makes grating nutmeg a pleasure. I love that I can store a few whole nutmegs inside it. I also like that there's a cap on the grater -- you can keep it inside a cabinet without little nutmeg flakes going everywhere (unlike with our salt and pepper grinders!)
customer_reviews.author: brinnet

customer_reviews.title: The best nutmeg grater I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This grater is easy to load and easy to use. It also grates nearly all of each nut with a fine grind. By far, this is the best nutmeg grater I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Loma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect find nutmeg grinder
customer_reviews.text: As long as I don't forget to take off the bottom cap when I grating my nutmeg this product is a winner! You can leave the cap on and grind but then when you take it off the nutmeg flies everywhere. It's just easier to take the cap off first. Very find grind, easy to crank.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy but small enough to fit comfortably in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out that the grinder chamber was spring-loaded (directions weren't clear, at least for me), use of this grater has been a breeze. Its sturdy but small enough to fit comfortably in my hand. The folding handle makes it more compact in the cupboard, and the bottom cap eliminates mess. 5 stars - couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this design
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and practical. You can store the nuts in the mill, too. It looks beautiful and it is easy to turn the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Had one from William Sonoma that was glass on top with a spring. Every time you opened it nutmeg went flying with the spring. This is so easy to load, store, and use. Just a few turns gives a great amount.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: At this point in my life, I'm trying not to accumulate any more stuff -- but I do like freshly ground nutmeg, and I was getting tired of scraping my knuckles on my nutmeg grater. This does an excellent job -- looks stylish -- and even stores extra nutmegs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Small-business owner

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a hand grater
customer_reviews.text: Smooth grinding action provides fragrantfresh grated nutmeg. So much better than a hand grater. Wish there was one for cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Rembrandt

customer_reviews.title: Best Grater Ever
customer_reviews.text: So expensive and soooooooo worth it! I use nutmeg more often because it's so easy with this grater. Fresh, powdery nutmeg with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: lstidham

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: much better than the old one I had. Very easy to load and the tines really hold the nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: StewL

customer_reviews.title: great and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This device is great and it works as it claims . Makes grinding nutmeg a breeze.I have used it often an found no problem with it so far. Comes with easy read directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew?
customer_reviews.text: Who knew freshly ground nutmeg tastes so much better then the store-bought ground stuff? (Now I do.)
customer_reviews.author: james_98188

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best nutmeg grater ever. I has others before but this one beats all.
customer_reviews.author: Regine L.

customer_reviews.title: my brother would recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother and he says he loves it. Definitely worth to have if you season a lot with nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Benson

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT grater!
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between getting this grater and the Peugot grater. I chose this one for two reasons: the column design (as opposed to Peugot's ball design) and the fact that this one has a cap on the bottom so the nutmeg doesn't leave trailings on the counter. I am VERY impressed with this grater. It grates so smoothly, the nutmeg comes out PERFECT, and you can't even hear it grating the nutmegs! I'm SOOOO glad I got this grater! It's definitely a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a nutmeg grater worthy of a long-term relationship! After several failed relationships with lesser graters, I'm so glad I upgraded to this well-made device. It's sleek and sturdy and, most importantly, it cranks out that wonderful fresh-ground nutmeg like a champ. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Denver Deb

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: fails after minimal use. Have to bend tines back to get it working again. Hard to load.
customer_reviews.author: KEB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just wish I would have bought such a wonderful nutmeg grater earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. Do not bother with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit M.M. Sims

customer_reviews.title: A smooth operator and also good looking.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many different types of nutmeg graters and this is by far the best that I've own so far. Nutmeg is one my favorite spices so this grater gets used often and it amazes how smooth and easy it is to use. I definitely recommend it if you're looking to replace what you currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Neal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Best nutmeg grinder we've ever had. It just works. Cap at bottom keeps it fresh. Grinds easily and stores well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use. Others we have purchased, break and don't hold the nutmegs as well. Highly recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best nutmeg grinder I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best nutmeg grinder I've ever used! The shavings are so fine it's amazing. I used this a few times a week and it feels like i'ts made of high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: Nice and neat. Easy to use. Washable. So far I like this. Hope it lasts as long as I suspect it will.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nutmeg grinder ever! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Webster

customer_reviews.title: This is not a cheap product and it has never ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap product and it has never ground a nutmeg. The instructions were in German and I therfore threw out the box being nogood to me. I did leave a notice to the customer and have never heard from them. So much for their grinder. Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: merle helen woods

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Broke in about a week, going to try to return to Amazon. Not what I expected for the price. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damage_Inc

customer_reviews.title: WOW! WHAT A GREAT NUTMEG GRINDER!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the cost, but this grinder is awesome! It grinds nutmeg like crazy. I love the storage compartment too. I had a bad experience with one of those short round grinders, which frustrated me so much and would leave me with halves of nutmegs that wouldn't grind, that I threw it out in the trash. I highly recommend this grinder, you won't be disappointed. I'm looking at buying a peppermill in this brand as well, and maybe some other products.
customer_reviews.author: Atheist

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just remember to take the cap/cover off before using!
customer_reviews.text: This product works just fine. I thought it was not working when I first used it but realized I had not removed the cap. Ha! So far I've been pretty happy with this product. Now I don't have to worry about grating my fingers or dropping the nutmeg into a sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Book Hoarder Letty

customer_reviews.title: Would be five-star if you could see the amount of nutmeg ground.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a five-star review if the amount of nutmeg you are grinding would show. The ground nutmeg accumulates in the black disc on the bottom of the grinder and until you remove it and look or measure it you don't know if you have enough or not. But, the grinder is easy to use and stores nutmegs also.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nutmeg Grater
customer_reviews.text: Chose this grater after reading many reviews. It arrived on time, in perfect condition and performs beautifully. There is plenty of storage and the cap that covers the bottom keeps the shelf free of nutmeg bits.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price ... quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grater for fresh nutmeg on Irish Coffee and homemade custard pie. When all else fails, read the instructions. It was a bit difficult putting the whole nutmeg into the lower part of the unit and applying the right amount of pressure to reinsert it back on the unit. I was overjoyed when I patiently pushed the lower unit into place. Nutmeg grated easily. Now I am searching for more recipes using nutmeg. I can’t wait to try it in Pumpkin Pie.
customer_reviews.author: barbwire

customer_reviews.title: Takes some attention
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any trouble operating this but my wife is constantly getting it stuck. Mostly from her insistence to use every little bit of the nutmeg and putting lots of small chunks in. I then have to unclog it for her. 5 stars from me but minus 1 star for not being dummy proof.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, prompt response from seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, prompt response from seller. I appreciated the quick and helpful reply when I communicated with the seller. The Nutmeg Grater is one of my favorite kitchen tools. I use it daily to grind fresh nutmeg in my coffee. The grater has a little storage area where a few extra nutmegs can be stored. Love it! Love it! I tried other graters but this one is best. Thanks for providing this terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Wishau

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off grinder
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year the pin that holds the handle to the grinder came apart from the cheap plastic top. Also always had trouble getting the nutmeg seed to make good contact with the very short prongs inside the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 15mths
customer_reviews.text: For 2 nutmeg nuts the GEFU 34670 was really good. Then half way through the 3rd nut I noticed that it was not working. What had happened was that the black plastic sleeve within the stainless steel tube - which the nut and cutter head assembly fit into - came out of the stainless steel tube. I assume the glue or press fit failed.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best in its category.
customer_reviews.text: This grater has several settings to vary the size of the grated nutmeg particles; however, so far, we haven't figured out how to make it grind finely. Nevertheless, it is extremely easy and fast to use and is compact so as not to take up too much space in the spice cupboard. Best nutmeg grater we've tried to date.
customer_reviews.author: William Yonce

customer_reviews.title: Ecellent construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made grinder - not cheap materials. It does an excellent job of grinding nutmeg. It has a storage chamber for extra nutmegs. The storage top is hard to pry off, but that means your extra stored nutmegs will not accidentally fall out. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Antony C. Bakke

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Nutmeg grater I have owned or used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Nutmeg grater I have owned or used. The grater shaves the nutmeg very thinly, unlike the older grater I have. And this unit uses 95% + of the nut instead of 75% like the old grater. It is easy to use for both men and women, has extra built in features and stores well due to its slim design. Even though the cost is more than I originally planned to spend, I am glad I spent the extra money because this grater is superior. I recommend the GEFU 346740 Nutmeg Grater as a best buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: SteveWA_Rvw

customer_reviews.title: Twist and enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Having struggled with two up-scale grinders that were barely mediocre in getting a reasonable amount of nutmeg vs the effort needed...go for this product. BMW class technology in a nutmeg grinder, and a longer warranty: it is superb. Easy to load, easy to use, easy to store, and the fresh micro-grated nut is the perfect cooking size.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiedoc

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but handle broke off and fell in kitchen sink disposal -- after much cursing retrieved it
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke off after less than a year of careful gentle use. Loved it 5 stars while working.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Baron

customer_reviews.title: No more frustration!
customer_reviews.text: After buying and using several of this type grater over the years and being sadly disappointed, I finally found qone that does a great job. I spent a half hour recently trying to grate a teaspoonful of nutmeg with my old grater; once I saw this one and read the ratings I threw out my old model and ordered thins one. I tried this one out as soon as it arrived and cannot believe how well it does its job! I had a half teaspoon grated in mere seconds. I wish I could have had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great, but short lived
customer_reviews.text: We loved this grinder, but it only lasted for 18 months. The soft plastic top decays rapidly, and soon the crank breaks off, rendering the grinder mechanism useless.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Expensive experiment
customer_reviews.text: This Nutmeg Grater worked very well for about a year, then the top black part disassembled from the bottom stainless part. It will still grind if I hold it together with one hand and use the other for turning the crank...out here now on Amazon buying a new and different one. Wish the old fashioned Nutmeg "mandoline" grater was still available. Mine worked well for over 20 years...
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Morrison

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the ease of function & effortless operation! Will be looking at other products by this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Microplane thingie with catch tray for years and it just didn't work well anymore. My fingertips matter to me, so it was time to look around. This thing from GEFU is a bit pricey, but it comes down to "you get what you paid for" mantra. This little machine works! It grinds a nutmeg like nobody's business and almost effortlessly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Condor

customer_reviews.title: best nutmeg grinder I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: best nutmeg grinder I have ever used. It actually loads (easily) a normal sized nut. Many don't. grinds well. super large storage. use all the time. recommend this grinder for nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: cragclimber

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to work nicely.
customer_reviews.text: It took some experimenting to figure out what went where, but it seems to work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got this! We use freshly ground nutmeg in our cooking fairly regularly. I had a different grater that was a pain to use and my husband suggested getting a new one. I was reluctant to spend more money, but I'm glad that I let him talk me into it. This grater is fantastic. It does a great job, it does it quickly, and it's easy to use. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great nutmeg mill
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little nutmeg mill. It fits in a small place, stores some of the nutmeg nuts and grind them down fabulously. Easy to handle, to say it short: I am very satisfied. It is a bit pricey but usually one gets what one pays for and this item is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works very well. Will buy more as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what is expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. Good job of shaving nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: MP Moore

customer_reviews.title: The best nutmeg grinder that we have used
customer_reviews.text: It grinds the nutmegs more easily and consistently than any we've ever used. Excellent design and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Bertsscreen

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It is so much easier for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my previous nutmeg grater. I love this! It is so much easier for my arthritic hand to use. It is well worth the price. Plus it looks so stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage and grater in one.
customer_reviews.text: I wonder why I waited so long to buy this! After using a hand grater for so long and wasting part of the nutmeg as well as having big pieces of nutmeg, this is a breeze. I am very pleased with the performance, the appearance and being able to store the nutmeg as well as grind it. Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great at grinding
customer_reviews.text: Works great at grinding, but for storage the lid needs to fit tighter, it always seems to fall off when I least expect it.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and easy to use. Works well. Have given several as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jimy A

customer_reviews.title: Got it right the first time
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and only Nutmeg Grinder I have ever had and I can't imagine a better product. Looks nice and works as smooth as silk with an absolutely perfect nutmeg grind output.
customer_reviews.author: gr8 gobbs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Solid construction. The size and consistency of the grate is very good. Cap on the bottom to keep residue off table is wonderful idea,
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic nutmeg grinder and storage!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, I would buy it again if it breaks (hopefully it wont!) It feels really solid too. Seller shipped quickly and it was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: JoeCat

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT NUTMEG GRATER
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO USE AND STORE. USE PRODUCT EVERYDAY. I PUT A LITTLE BIT OF NUTMEG IN MY COFFEE BEFORE I BREW IT AND THIS NUTMEG GRATER IS PERFECT FOR EVERYDAY USE.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grater
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, easy to use grater. It stores whole nutmegs in the top, grabs and grinds one at the bottom and has a cap below to catch stray nutmeg crumbs. I was impressed with how smoothly and quietly it works. The grind is very fine and uniform. The handle folds back on itself for easy storage. This is not my first nutmeg grinder, but having put up with ones that go dull, grind unevenly, and have no bottom cap, I believe that this will be my last. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The Best Nutmeg Grinder Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several others, and just to put it simply this one is THE BEST! It's easy to use and does a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cotogno

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a Nutmeg grinder, this works almost as micro plane. Use it all the time and am 100% pleased.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Nutmeg Grater I have bought so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Nutmeg Grater I have bought so far, it's easy to use and you won't accidently grind your fingers. I recommend it to everyone who love fresh ground nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaKitKat

customer_reviews.title: GEFU 34670 Nutmeg Grater
customer_reviews.text: At least one critical piece was weaker than the nutmeg and snapped. Too late to return for refund. Threw it in the trash. For this kind of money, I expect better quality.

customer_reviews.text: See no reason this won't last me for a long time. Does a good job.

customer_reviews.title: Love this grater
customer_reviews.text: Love this grater. Grates to a nice consistency - not too coarse/not too fine. Easy to load. No more wasting the little remaining ends of nutmeg seeds or scraping fingers on a hand grater.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Take note of the loading direction printed on the side.
customer_reviews.text: Actually works with minimal hassle if you use it according to the instructions. Don't forget to take the bottom off just as you have to remember to take the lens cap off your camera.

customer_reviews.title: Not worthwhile. Only holds one whole nutmeg.
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY disappointed upon receiving this item. It holds ONE single nutmeg. If you have pieces leftover from using a microplane grater, forget about using them. It's going back immediately. There was nothing about it being able to hold ONE nutmeg in the description. Completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L
